recipe.title: Hash Brown Breakfast Cups Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 20 oz ; frozen shredded hash brown, thawed ; (565 g)
1 ¼ cups ; shredded cheddar cheese, shredded ; (125 g)

steps.step: In a bowl, combine hash browns, one cup of cheddar (100 g), salt, pepper, and olive oil.
Divide hash brown mixture into the cups of a 12-cup muffin tin. Press the hash browns down firmly along the shape of the cups. Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20 minutes to set the cups.
Crack an egg into each cup and sprinkle some salt, pepper, and the remaining cheddar on top. Bake again at 350°F (180°C) for 13-15 minutes, or until the egg whites have set.
After they have cooled, remove cups by running a knife along their edges. Serve with all the toppings you desire!

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a bowl, combine hash browns, one cup of cheddar (100 g), salt, pepper, and olive oil.
Divide hash brown mixture into the cups of a 12-cup muffin tin.
Press the hash browns down firmly along the shape of the cups.
Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20 minutes to set the cups.
Crack an egg into each cup and sprinkle some salt, pepper, and the remaining cheddar on top.
Bake again at 350°F (180°C) for 13-15 minutes, or until the egg whites have set.
After they have cooled, remove cups by running a knife along their edges.
Serve with all the toppings you desire!
